column1: 6,11,product_measurement_table,Product Measurements,"['chest_width', 'sleeve_length', 'body_length']",https://www.lacoste.com/us/lacoste/men/clothing/button-down-shirts/CH3346-51-DPC.html,"Each size of this garment has a table for ""product measurements"" (stored in this table) and ""body measurements"" (shown in size_guides).",2025-08-10 02:53:17.819195,1,,,https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ySaeY5J3Y_L6PjytmT_la-lkya59sKCY/view?usp=drive_link,"Size guide

1,13,product_description,NULL,['body_length'],https://vuoriclothing.com/products/strato-tech-tee-chambray-heather,"See under fit tab on product page: ""29"" body length""",2025-08-10 02:25:45.927532,1,,,https://drive.google.com/file/d/1QLRfIy-G0i_M_zXCupn0ILPBzQzXHTw3/view?usp=drive_link,"29"" body length"
• Bruce is 187 cm / 6'2 / 6'1 and is wearing a size M
A) 1/2 Chest Width - Measure the Chest under the armpit straight to the other armpit. For around chest circumference, double the chest value of our chart.
B) Center Back Length - Measured at center of back from bottom of collar to the hem.
C) Sleeve Length - Measured from the shoulder seam and down the outer sleeve to the bottom of the cuff.
